item.title: Criterions for Site
item.description: 1-Titles 1.1-All Cap for first letter of each word in post title, except for preposition. 1.2-Cap for first letter of first word inside post. 1.3-Titles inside post need follow format of this Criterions. 2-Tags 3-TOC This is criterions for this site, self-reference only. 1-Titles 1.1-All Cap for first letter of each word in post title, except for preposition. 1.2-Cap for first letter of first word inside post. 1.3-Titles inside post need follow format of this Criterions.
